alert.note: Alert for Aiken (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 4:29PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Aiken County through 500 PM EDT... At 428 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Aiken Municipal Airport, or near Aiken, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Aiken, Aiken Municipal Airport, USC Aiken, Wagener, Perry, Vaucluse and New Holland. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 14 and 37. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
